## DisplayableFacet interface

A [Facet](./answers-headless.facet.md) which contains extra fields meant to be displayed to the end user.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface DisplayableFacet extends Facet 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [Facet](./answers-headless.facet.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [displayName](./answers-headless.displayablefacet.displayname.md) | string | The name of the facet which is meant to be displayed to the user. |
|  [fieldId](./answers-headless.displayablefacet.fieldid.md) | string | The associated fieldId. |
|  [options](./answers-headless.displayablefacet.options.md) | [DisplayableFacetOption](./answers-headless.displayablefacetoption.md)<!-- -->\[\] | An array of [DisplayableFacetOption](./answers-headless.displayablefacetoption.md) |
